medical_history.chief_complaint: Red papules and plaques with severe itching.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days after receiving the second dose of COVID-19 vaccination, initially manifesting as isolated papules on both lower extremities, which quickly coalesced and spread throughout the entire body. The symptoms have progressed over a duration of 1 year.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 20-year history of oral lichen planus, well-controlled hypertension, and poorly controlled diabetes mellitus type 2.
